Title: Incipit Page with Illuminated Titlepiece
Medium: ink and pigments on cream and pink-tinted laid paper
Description: This incipit page from Walters manuscript W.621 has an illuminated titlepiece inscribed Kitab-i bustan-i Shaykh-i Sa'di in gold Tawqi' script.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Codex; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Original Binding; Iran; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Sa'di (died 691 AH/AD 1292)
